traits.description: Increase final damage by **13%**. When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, **Sparrow Feather** launch frequency increased to **1** per second.

Increase final damage by **18%**. When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, Sparrow Feather launch frequency increases to **1** per second. When Sparrow Feather hits and triggers the spreading effect, it additionally spreads **Ion Scorch** and **Cross Burn**.

In team play, your damage taken from the aggroed target is reduced by **5%**. When Fortitude Resonance is activated, the damage reduction increases to **8%**.
